text: Valladolid-Campo Grande railway station serves the Spanish city of Valladolid. It is served by the Madrid–León high-speed rail line to Madrid-Chamartín and regional trains to Santander, Ponferrada and Vitoria-Gasteiz. ==Services== ==References== Category:Valladolid Category:Railway stations in Castile and León Category:Buildings and structures in Valladolid
title: Valladolid-Campo Grande railway station
